bak_optconf.message: Not set the default download manager, open options page now ?

clear_confirm.message: Are you sure to disable this item ?

clear_tip.message: Click here to disable this item if the program is not in your system now.

description.message: External download managers support for Chrome, with contextmenus.

hlp_a.message: Thank you for the installation, now your Chrome supports external download-managers.

hlp_c.message: Context menu works now, please visit options page.

hlp_d.message: Click here to open options page

hlp_e.message: When you have any idears, let me know.

hlp_f.message: You may want to check out some extensions below:

opt_custom4.message: When the path contains spaces, use double quotes.

opt_int_desc.message: Links will be tested in lower case. The default Ctrl + Alt +Click is not effected.

opt_int_leftc.message: Use left click to download(First line is extensions, second line is Javascript Regexs, all those separated by ",".)

opt_menu_auto.message: 3) If there is only one menu item, display it instead of main menu item.

opt_menu_main.message: Menu item text(main text of Chrome's own context menu, only works when third checkbox not checked)

opt_menu_showmenu.message: 4) Show quick context menu when [Shift] + [Right click]

opt_msg_saved.message: Saved, options may works in new tabs.

opt_sel_title.message: Please select a default download manager
